RelatedSentence: BEIRUT : Lebanese police have arrested a drug trafficker along with two other suspects wanted in connection with alleged drug abuse and the buying of stolen property .
A statement Monday from the Internal Security Forces said an investigation led to the arrest Sunday of Sh .
The ISF said 1 kilogram of marijuana was found in the spare wheel of the suspect 's vehicle .
The suspect had intended to smuggle the hash from the Bekaa Valley to Beirut , according to the statement .
